function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited personal contact and physical activities due to public health measures can lead to a decline in mental health and well-being","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, depression, and feelings of isolation, and reduced compliance with public health measures","Mitigation":"Identify alternative and complementary activities to promote mental health and well-being, and encourage compliance with public health measures","Technologies":"Telehealth services, virtual social platforms, mental health apps","People":"General population, individuals in quarantine or self-isolation","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Dissemination of information about the therapeutic effects of physical activities may lead to misinformation or overemphasis on its benefits","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the benefits of physical exercise on COVID-19 prevention and treatment","Mitigation":"Provide accurate and balanced information about the effects of exercise on physical health and its role in COVID-19 prevention and treatment","Technologies":"Health education campaigns, accurate reporting by news media","People":"General population, individuals with mild coronavirus infection","Owner":"Health educators, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Initial evidence indicating that individuals can maintain and promote mental health through exercise during the pandemic may lead to over-reliance on exercise as a solution to mental health challenges","Impact":"Neglect of other mental health interventions and overemphasis on exercise as the sole solution to mental health challenges","Mitigation":"Promote a holistic approach to mental health that includes various interventions beyond exercise, such as therapy, counseling, and social support","Technologies":"Teletherapy services, mental health apps, online support groups","People":"Individuals seeking mental health support during the pandemic","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
